name: 2.6 Hog Cycle
coreStrategy: Fast cycle to overwhelm opponent with Hog Rider pushes, supported by cheap defense and spells.

name: P.E.K.K.A Bridge Spam
coreStrategy: Aggressive pushes at the bridge with fast troops, backed by P.E.K.K.A defense and spells.

name: Golem Beatdown
coreStrategy: Build a massive push behind Golem, using support troops and spells to destroy towers.

name: X-Bow 2.9 Cycle
coreStrategy: Defend and cycle to X-Bow to lock onto opponent's towers, using cheap cards and spells.

name: LavaLoon
coreStrategy: Air-based beatdown, using Lava Hound as a tank for Balloon and other air support.

name: Log Bait
coreStrategy: Force out opponent's small spells with bait cards, then punish with Goblin Barrel.
